website_summaries.verdict: This trio of stylish and contemporary looking square shelves are as versatile as they are affordable.
pros: These shelves stand out for their non-standard square shape
Though they can be used for general storage, they make excellent accent pieces for holding decorative items
Easy to hang with detailed instructions
cons: Some buyers found them smaller than expected, though they are true to the listed sizes

customer_reviews.title: Both 1st and 2nd time came damaged
customer_reviews.text: The first photo is of the first one I received which came damaged. I requested a new one and the second photo is the new one I received. Both times came damaged. They look terrific when mounted but its crap wood they are using. I would have returned it but more than likely I'll get another damaged one. 2 out of 2 is bad odds.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but Work to Install
customer_reviews.text: I still have yet to install them. Best to use heavy duty tools, like a Black and Decker drill, as it needs to be really implanted into the wall, especially with the weight of the box they come in. I expected something lighter and more easily installed. I still plan on using them when I have a home I expect to live in for well more than a year. For now, it would be wasteful to put all that effort to install it, only having to take it out to move. P.S. Best on strong walls.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: My biggest gripe with any shelf is the difficulty of installing it. These come with really clear instructions and print outs. You'll need a drill with a bit wide enough for the anchors, but my drill set already had this. Otherwise a hammer for the anchors but that's it. I had no issues with installation, they look great and lay flush against the wall, and are super cute with my trinkets and statues on them. Great addition to any room for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Morse

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Average at best. You get what you pay for. Mounting hooks are visible when looking straight on or from the sides. Used these in a rental and did not return, but if they were in my home, I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, sleek cube shelves.
customer_reviews.text: DOUBLE CHECK YOUR TEMPLANTS, if you’re using them. Mine didn’t line up at all. I ended up using 3M picture hanging strips and they are holding well, I might move them and didn’t want 6 holes in my bedroom wall. I don’t intend on putting anything heavy on them. They came with a lot of dirt/scratch marks, some of them wiped off. Also, do yourself a favor and toss the piece of “level” that comes with the hardware and use a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Tina G

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I was expecting worse. They are more heavyweight and durable than I expected, but there are visible nicks in the wood that chipped the black paint off. I cut and adhered sound absorbing foam to the back of these to help with noise from the shared wall with my neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Bought a set for either side of the tv
customer_reviews.text: Hanging hardware was crooked. And we’ve had bad luck trusting similar shelves before. I used command Velcro picture hanging strips and a real level and they turned out perfect. The medium box had a little hole on the front and the stickers were a pain to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Siscoziger

customer_reviews.title: Wood Square Shelves
customer_reviews.text: A simple design, good size, and easy setup. The downside is that they're not quite as sturdy as I would like. When a received mine, the largest of the shelves had split along it's seem. Very little glue seemed to have been used, so I re-glued it with some good wood glue instead. However, I'm skeptical of actually hanging it up anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packing
customer_reviews.text: For the love of all that is holy why would you put these awful stickers right on the paint on these cheap shelves, its taken me longer with goo-gone to remove the stickers than it would have taken me to grow the teee myself, cut it down, build, paint and hang the shelves. Absolutely zero stars for this epic failure.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford martin

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had the shelves hanging for a couple weeks. Today I saw that one of them with something very small in it is broken. The corner came completely apart. The squares are simply glued together, there isn't a nail or screw to be found. I'm scared to use them to store anything now.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Call the professionals for this project
customer_reviews.text: These square shelves are nice quality but I had a very hard time hanging these up. After installing my other flat floating shelves, I was thinking these would be easy too. Nooooooo so freaking frustrating! I made ugly holes in my wall. I could’ve called my local handyman for this project. Will I buy these again? Not unless they design an easier way to install. 🥴
customer_reviews.author: Qiana J

customer_reviews.title: Should be FAB!!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived super quick. I haven't installed them in the bathroom yet, but it comes with EVERYTHING for a fool-proof job! I LOVE the templates they give you!! Genius!!! Can't wait to put them up!
customer_reviews.author: Aimy McRae

customer_reviews.title: easy install
customer_reviews.text: I love that these came with sheets of paper marking where I needed to install the screws. It made it so much easier to place the 3 separate papers around until I found how I wanted my shelves to sit on my walls
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Really love these shelves
customer_reviews.text: Really love these shelves! They are very well made and I love how the mounting holes are done on these. This set came with drywall anchors, screws, and even a little level to get things perfect. For the price, I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and look.
customer_reviews.author: GrooveMerchant

customer_reviews.title: Knicks and Chips
customer_reviews.text: These look super cute in my bedroom, but they came shipped with a lot of knicks and chips. Nothing you can’t paint over but still.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Gah
customer_reviews.text: This was a pain in the ass to make perfect on the wall 😑 but cute. But does scuff up easily. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ann wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am having problems attaching these to my walls with Velcro. They have fallen twice and borders were damaged. So I wouldn't recommend using Velcro to attach it to walls. Otherwise product as such is good. They have good space and looks good on wall.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep Pinjerla

customer_reviews.title: damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I do like these a lot and they look good on the wall. The templates included are so easy to use, included hardware is easy to use. Two of the three boxes had damaged fronts (i was able to fill and paint so you don't notice), also they have stickers on them that are hard to remove, I used wd30 to get the stick off and of course some paint as well. If they would have arrived without me having to work on them they would have rated much higher.
customer_reviews.author: TW Shep

customer_reviews.title: not Bad
customer_reviews.text: The templates where a wonderful idea and made hanging these much easier. They had a couple little dings but nothing that’s noticeable once it’s hung on the wall.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelving
customer_reviews.text: great purchase...looks nice on my bathroom. Adds a modern touch. Great for the price and very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: I made it work and found some good decor for them - just not what I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! But there aren't many objects that can fit in the dimensions. Most books stick out too far. With a bit of effort, I made it work and found some good decor for them - just not what I had originally planned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but just make sure to make marks ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute shelves! Added a cute touch to one of my blank walls. Easy to install but just make sure to make marks on the wall of where you want to put them so then you don't have to keep trying to get them perfectly aligned (or else you'll have a lot of holes in your walls after trying and trying)

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and easy to hang

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love em! Keep the instructions, they come with wall hanging help!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They even came with paper stencils to make hanging them up super easy. You just put the paper up against the wall and poke your screw through it. Very handy! So don't throw away the instructions!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These shelves look great and are easy to put up (instructions and templates are included). For $20, this product is great, but there were a few scuffs in the paint and I had to superglue one of the edges back together, which is why it is receiving a 4 instead of 5 stars.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then I thought
customer_reviews.text: But that was my b they are super nice an they look rly cute

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, sturdy, and nice look
customer_reviews.text: The included cutouts make drilling the holes in the correct place easy. They look very nice and very clean, and can definitely hold their own weight. Thinking about buying more to finish up an empty wall.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Missing screws
customer_reviews.text: Received this product with a bag of 5 screws. There are 3 shelves and each require 2 screws to hook on the left and right. I have to return the entire product and get it replaced because I cannot request the manufacturer to just send me 1 screw.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Wtf?!
customer_reviews.text: First off, these shelves came late. When they finally arrived, I noticed the box was extremely damaged, and it looked like the box had been opened and resealed several times. I then opened the box and saw that all four corners of the largest shelf were completely bashed in, making them almost rounded. On top of all that, the box said it contained all necessary tools to hang these shelves... but then in the instructions it said that a drill and several other tools were needed. The quality of this item was not worth the total 25 bucks. Overall, I'm confused by this product. I would recommend avoiding it and saving your money.
customer_reviews.author: O.B.

customer_reviews.title: very well made

customer_reviews.title: I liked these shelves very much
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shelves very much. What I really liked is the fact they sent templates with the shelves so you knew exactly where to put the screws, which made them very easy to hang. They also included the screws as well. I would definitely recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: They look good and can hold everything that I wanted! It was easy to install and came with everything you needed. (Except the screwdriver). For the price, you cannot go wrong with these!

customer_reviews.title: Good for small Foyers
customer_reviews.text: I thought it be Bigger than it looks, but it's quite small. Good for small Foyers.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shelves.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality and worked well for my spare bedroom. The only negative critique is that the mounting holes on the back are not flush. When the shelf is installed you can see the screw heads/anchors. The mounting holes should be flush for a more aesthetic appearance when hung.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these wall decorations, and when I open the box the big one was broken and chipped ! I’m so disappointed in these and paid so much money ridiculous

customer_reviews.title: High Quality. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than expected but are high quality and came well packaged. There were some minor cosmetic issues but not very noticeable.

customer_reviews.text: They look cute. Comes with paper cut outs of shelves so it's easy to drill holes.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These 3D wall boxes are perfect for any room. I love the different sizes. They are easy to assemble. I also received them sooner than expected. I would definitely recommend these boxes to add a touch of interest to their wall.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Comes with template to align holes. Just make sure template is level when you mark the holes.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shelf set!
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are great! They are very eye-catching and are simply awesome to look at. I mainly got them to display my Funko collectibles. Installation was very straightforward and it comes with step-by-step instructions. It comes with all the necessary materials including templates to preview how the shelves will look on the wall before you start drilling holes. The box also comes with a small liquid leveler to make sure your shelves are not tilted, as well as screws. The only thing you will need is a drill and a drill bit. Overall, I highly recommend these shelves. I plan on getting more of these or some of those U-shaped shelves other reviews had.
customer_reviews.author: Megen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Modern Shelves!

The only reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I had a hard time hanging them. I like that it came with hardware, but the pieces that were meant to anchor the screws in the wall don't fit very well; I ended up just skipping them and putting the screws directly in the wall (and I definitely should have used a stud-finder).

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some simple floating shelves to showcase some of my collectibles. These work perfectly and I like the different sizes. It came with mounting guides which really helped and made putting these up simple. Took maybe ten minutes? My larger square shelf was not glued/secured properly so it can come apart but what bothers me more is you can really see the seam. I'll just buy some touch up paint, but for the price, I guess you you sacrifice a bit of quality. Secondly, the stickers on the bottom of the shelves are a pain to get off. Overall, I'd recommend you get these if you're not sure.

product_meta.title: MELANNCO Floating Wall Mount Square Cube Shelves, Set of 3, Black, 3 Count
product_meta.description: These Melannco Square Shelves can be used individually or combined for a unique geometric display. They are designed to provide a practical and stylish addition to just about any room. You can place this set of black shelves on a table or hang them on a wall. The necessary hanging materials, as well as a convenient template, level and instructions, are also included. All three of these wood shelves are in different sizes and support different weights. You can use them to show off keepsakes, such as collectibles or photos. They also can effectively display books or other items. They are made of sturdy MDF wood and have a sophisticated black finish. The large measures 9x9-inches, medium measures 7x7-inches and the small measures 5x5-inches; holds up to 12 lbs., 10 lbs. and 8 lbs., respectively. This set of shelves will hang flush against the wall. Each shelf features 2 hanging hardware brackets. Clean with a dry cloth when needed.
feature_bullets: SET OF 3 SQUARE SHELVES: This set includes 3 square shelves; 1 small, 1 medium, and 1 large.
TIMELESS BLACK FINISH: These shelves feature a timeless black finish that matches easily to any home décor.
VERSATILE AND UNQIUE LOOK: You have the option to group the shelves together or hang separately for the perfect accent for any room; these shelves will hang flush against the wall.

MADE FROM LIGHWEIGHT MATERIALS: These shelves are made from lightweight MDF wood. The large shelf measures at 9x9 inches, medium measures at 7x7 inches and the small measures at 5x5 inches. Each shelf is about 3.5-inches deep.
EASY INSTALLATION: These square wood shelves are easy to hang. The set includes detailed instructions with hanging template, a small level, and hardware for easy mounting.
